x-redlock-auth.description: The x-redlock-auth value is a JSON Web Token (JWT).
x-redlock-auth.name: x-redlock-auth

redlockMapping.description: true = Prisma Cloud will provide field value for notification

typeaheadUri.description: URL used to query suggestions for field value

name.description: Name. Cannot include special characters ('<', '>', '!', '=', '\\n', '\\r'). Maximum length is 99.

info.description: Notification templates allow you to map the Prisma Cloud alert payload to the ServiceNow or Jira incident fields.
info.title: Prisma Cloud User Notification Templates API Overview

get.description: Returns a list of notification templates.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template?type=SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json; charset=UTF-8",
    'x-redlock-auth': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template \
  --header 'content-type: application/json; charset=UTF-8' \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Returns the notification template with the specified ID.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/{id}"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/{id} \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

put.description: Updates the notification template with the specified ID.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/{id}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json; charset=UTF-8",
    'x-redlock-auth': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

response = requests.request("PUT", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request PUT \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/{id} \
  --header 'content-type: application/json; charset=UTF-8' \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

delete.description:
Deletes the notification template with the specified ID.  

**Deprecation Notice:** This endpoint is deprecated for integrations with all external systems except the following:

* Okta
* Qualys
* Tenable

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/{id}"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("DELETE", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request DELETE \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/{id} \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

post.description:
Clones an existing notification template to create a new template.  

There is currently only one body parameter, as shown below.

Parameter | Type | Value | Required 
-------------| ---- | ----------- | ---
name | string | The name of the new notification template | Required

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/clone/{id}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json; charset=UTF-8",
    'x-redlock-auth': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/notification/template/clone/{id} \
  --header 'content-type: application/json; charset=UTF-8' \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists the fields available to include in a ServiceNow notification template.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/template/servicenow/{integrationId}/{incidentType}/fields"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/template/servicenow/{integrationId}/{incidentType}/fields \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists suggestions for the specified integration, service type, and field name. Accepts a query to narrow the list.

parameters.description: Case-insensitive search filter. Response includes only items that contain the query as a substring.
parameters.name: query

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://api.prismacloud.io/template/servicenow/{integrationId}/{incidentType}/fields/{objectName}/{referenceField}/suggestions?query=SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/template/servicenow/{integrationId}/types"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/template/servicenow/{integrationId}/types \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists Jira projects for the specified integration ID.

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/projects/{integrationId}"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/projects/{integrationId} \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists configurable fields for Jira notification template.

x-codeSamples.source:

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/{integrationId}/{project}/{issueType}"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/{integrationId}/{project}/{issueType} \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists Jira issue types for the specified integration ID and project key.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/issues/{integrationId}/{projectKey}"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/issues/{integrationId}/{projectKey} \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists Jira users that you can include in a notification template.

parameters.description: A search string to match against Jira user attributes. The string can match the prefix of the attribute's value.
parameters.name: searchKey

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/{integrationId}/{project}/{issueType}/users/{searchKey}"

headers = {'x-redlock-auth': 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/{integrationId}/{project}/{issueType}/users/{searchKey} \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

get.description: Lists Jira issue types for the specified integration ID and project key.

parameters.description: Case-insensitive search filter. Response includes only items that contain the query as a substring.
parameters.name: query

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://api.prismacloud.io/template/fields/jira/{integrationId}/{project}/{issueType}/{jiraEndpoint}/{fieldType}/{field}?query=SOME_STRING_VALUE' \
  --header 'x-redlock-auth: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
